subject: Hockey, Ice
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Slava Voynov of the Los Angeles Kings said Voynov never hit his girlfriend, and he blamed Voynov’s recent arrest on a misunderstanding partly caused by the couple’s limited ability to speak English.
snippet: A lawyer for Slava Voynov of the Los Angeles Kings said Voynov never hit his girlfriend, and he blamed Voynov’s recent arrest on a misunderstanding partly caused by the couple’s limited ability to speak English.
